seo: Spring Boot,目录遍历漏洞,CVE-2021-21234,插件,检测
summary: 该插件用于检测Spring Boot应用中spring-boot-actuator-logview组件在0.2.13版本之前存在的目录遍历漏洞，通过构造特定payload尝试读取/etc/passwd文件验证漏洞是否存在。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect the directory traversal vulnerability in the spring-boot-actuator-logview component of Spring Boot applications with versions prior to 0.2.13. It verifies the existence of the vulnerability by constructing a specific payload to attempt reading the /etc/passwd file.
